Ancestry-Goblin -- Male Unbreakable Goblin Fighter

Background: Acolyte Deity: Gozreh
Experience: 482/1000 Level: 1 Speed: 20 Size: Small Encumbered/Maximum Bulk: 6/11
Attribute Notes:
Armor Speed Penalty: -5 Speed
Attribute Boosts: Attribute Boost (Choose 4 from any)
Cave Climber: Has a 10' climb Speed
Features/Skills

Fighter Feats: Class Feats (Choose 1 from any)
Fighter Key Attribute: 1 selection
Goblin Heritage: 1 selection
Goblin Lore: Has the Additional Lore (Goblin Lore) feature
Rough Rider: Has the Ride feature
Darkvision: Has normal b/w vision in darkness and dim light
Perception: +5 (wisdom; expert)
Skill Modifiers:
Acrobatics: +2 (dexterity; untrained) Diplomacy: +2 (charisma; untrained) Religion: +3 (wisdom; trained)
Arcana: +1 (intelligence; untrained) Goblin Lore: +4 (intelligence; trained) Scribing Lore: +4 (intelligence; trained)
Architecture Lore: +4 (intelligence; trained) Intimidation: +2 (charisma; untrained) Society: +4 (intelligence; trained)

Skill Notes:
Additional Lore (Goblin Lore): Skill Trained (Goblin Lore)
Armor Skill Penalty: -2 strength and dexterity skills
Fighter Skills: Skill Trained (Choose 1 from Acrobatics, Athletics; Choose 4 from any)
Goblin Lore: Skill Trained (Nature; Stealth)
Intelligence Language Bonus: +1 Language Count
Vandal: Skill Trained (Thievery)
City Scavenger: +2 Subsist and can attempt +2 Society or Survival to Earn Income from using Subsist in a settlement
Junk Tinker: Can use Crafting on junk to create shoddy level 0 items and suffers no penalty from using them
Ride: Automatically succeeds when using Command An Animal to move/Mount acts on self turn
Rough Rider: +1 Nature to Command An Animal with a goblin dog or wolf mount
Student Of The Canon: Critical failures on Religion checks to Decipher Writing or Recall Knowledge are normal failures/Failures to Recall Knowledge about own faith are successes, and successes are critical successes
Very Sneaky: +5' Sneak and can Sneak between cover
Very,Very Sneaky: Can Sneak at full Speed and Hide or Sneak without cover
Combat
Hit Points: 21 Armor Class: 18 (dexterity (1 max); trained) Class DC: Fighter: 17 (dexterity; trained)
Armor: Breastplate Shield: Tower (+2 AC when raised; hardness 5; HP 20) Weapons: Dogslicer (+9 1d6+1 S; dexterity; expert); Jaws (+9 1d6+1 P; dexterity; expert); Longspear (+6 1d8+1 P; strength; expert); Sawtooth Saber (+7 1d6+1 S; dexterity; trained); Shield Boss (+6 1d6+1 B; strength; expert)
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +1
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +1
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +4
Goblin Weapon Familiarity: Weapon Familiarity (Goblin Weapons)
Loud Singer: Has increased Goblin Song effects
Razortooth Goblin: Jaws attack inflicts 1d6 HP piercing
Skittering Scuttle: Has increased Goblin Scuttle effects
Strength Attack Adjustment: +1
Unbreakable Goblin: +4 Hit Points
Burn It!: Persistent fire damage from an attack inflicts +1 HP, and alchemical fire items inflict additional damage equal to 1/4 the item level
Cling: (1) After a successful Strike with a hand free, latches onto the target until it succeeds on a DC 12 Escape
Exacting Strike: (1) Strike does not count toward the multiple attack penalty on failure
Goblin Scuttle: (R) Takes a Step or a 10' Stride when an ally moves to an adjacent position
Goblin Song: (1) R60' Successful Performance vs. the Will DC of 2 targets inflicts -1 Perception and Will for 1 rd, or for 1 min on a critical success
Goblin Weapon Familiarity: Has access to uncommon goblin weapons
Kneecap: (1) Successful melee Strike inflicts -10 Speed for 1 rd, or -15 Speed on a critical success
Reactive Strike: (R) Makes a melee Strike on a foe within reach that uses a manipulate or move action, makes a ranged Strike, or leaves a square while moving
Shield Block: (R) Raised shield negates damage equal to its hardness; self and shield each suffer any remaining damage
Vandal: Strikes against unattended objects and traps ignore Hardness 5
Save: Fortitude: +6 (constitution; expert); Reflex: +9 (dexterity; expert); Will: +3 (wisdom; trained)
Save Notes:
Charhide Goblin: Has fire resistance 1 and ends persistent fire damage with success on a DC 10 flat check, or on a DC 5 flat check with help
Irongut Goblin: Can safely eat garbage and when sickened, +2 vs. conditions inflicted by ingestion, and successes on Fortitude saves vs. ingestion conditions are critical successes
Reckless Abandon: (F) Critical failures and failures on saves due to hazardous actions are successes and result in minimum damage until the end of the turn once per day
Snow Goblin: Has cold resistance 1 and treats environmental cold as 1 step less extreme
Unbreakable Goblin: Reduces falling damage by half the distance
Magic
Magic Notes: Burn It!: Fire spells inflict additional damage equal to half the spell rank
Notes
